longevityPyramid.title: The Longevity Pyramid
longevityPyramid.subtitle: Key pillars that form the foundation of a long and healthy life

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.description: The foundation of longevity starts with proper nutrition. Focus on whole foods, plant-based diet, moderate protein intake, and periodic fasting. What you eat directly impacts your cellular health and aging processes.

exercise.title: Physical Activity
exercise.description: Regular exercise is crucial for longevity. Include a mix of cardio, strength training, and flexibility exercises. Exercise improves cardiovascular health, maintains muscle mass, and enhances cellular repair mechanisms.

sleep.title: Quality Sleep
sleep.description: Sleep is when your body repairs and regenerates. Aim for 7-8 hours of quality sleep each night. Poor sleep accelerates aging and increases risk for chronic diseases.

stress.title: Stress Management
stress.description: Chronic stress accelerates aging at the cellular level. Incorporate stress reduction techniques like meditation, deep breathing, or yoga into your daily routine.

social.title: Social Connection
social.description: Strong social relationships are linked to longer lifespans. Maintain meaningful connections with family, friends, and community to support emotional wellbeing and resilience.

purpose.title: Purpose & Meaning
purpose.description: Having a sense of purpose and meaning in life is associated with longevity. Engage in activities that give you a sense of fulfillment and contribution to something greater than yourself.

hero.title: Community Research Platform
hero.subtitle: Join thousands of people contributing to longevity research. Track your biomarkers, participate in studies, and help advance our understanding of healthy aging.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Our community research platform makes it easy to contribute to longevity science while tracking your own health data.

step1.title: Track Your Biomarkers
step1.description: Enter your health data securely and anonymously. Track changes over time and see how you compare to reference ranges.

step2.title: Join Research Projects
step2.description: Participate in community research projects that interest you. Your data is always anonymized and aggregated.

step3.title: See the Impact
step3.description: Access insights from community research and see how your contributions are advancing longevity science.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our community research platform.
faq.q1: Is my data secure and private?
faq.a1: Yes, all data is anonymized and encrypted. We never share individual data with third parties, and you can delete your data at any time.
faq.q2: What kind of biomarkers can I track?
faq.a2: You can track a wide range of biomarkers including blood markers, vitamins, lipids, hormones, and inflammation markers. We're constantly adding new categories based on community feedback.
faq.a3: Research projects are created by our scientific team in collaboration with academic researchers. Community members can also propose research questions that may become future projects.
faq.q4: Can I see my personal trends over time?
faq.a4: Yes, you can view charts and trends of your biomarkers over time, and compare them to community averages while maintaining anonymity.

cta.title: Join Our Research Community Today
cta.subtitle: Be part of something bigger. Help advance longevity science while tracking your own health journey.
